Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay let me try to understand this BPMN diagram step by step

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First theres a Start Event where everything begins with receiving a customer request Then theres an XOR gateway that checks the type of the requesteither Standard or Custom

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: If its Standard it goes to Task B1 for validation Then another AND gateway triggers parallel tasks C1 and C2 credit check and inventory check Once both are done they join via a Gateway I assume this is an End Event for those branches leading to Task D Calculate Delivery Date

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: If the request was Custom it goes to Task B2 where they analyze feasibility Another XOR gateway checks if its feasible If yes prepare a quotation no leads to rejecting the request and ending there

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After either path Standard or Custom theres another XOR that decides if approval is needed If yes go through Task F to get manager approval Then another XOR if approved generate the invoice otherwise reevaluate conditions by looping back to E1 Custom or D Standard If no approval is needed just generate the invoice directly

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Finally send a confirmation to the customer and end

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
